New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi became the fastest Pakistani to reach 100 ODI wickets.
Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi rattled the Bangladeshi top order and ended with figures of 9-123-3.
Fakhar Zaman scored 81 runs off 74 balls, including 3 fours and 7 sixes.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz picked up all three wickets for Bangladesh and joined the 100-wicket ODI club.
Pakistan chased down the target of 204 runs in 32.3 overs, winning by 7 wickets.
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam praised the team's performance in all three departments and emphasized the importance of Fakhar Zaman's innings.
Shakib Al Hasan expressed disappointment with Bangladesh's batting performance and acknowledged Pakistan's superior play.
Fakhar Zaman reflected on his hard work and practice after the Asia Cup, which paid off in this match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's batting never really clicked, and they have now lost six games on the trot after winning their opening game.
Taskin Ahmed bowled well initially but later started to leak runs.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz was the only bowler who created wicket-taking opportunities for Bangladesh.
